segment.source: Troubleshooting UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Troubleshooting UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Troubleshooting UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Troubleshooting UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Troubleshooting UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Troubleshooting UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Troubleshooting content is not included in the Administrator's Guide for this product.
segment.target: Troubleshooting content is not included in the Administrator's Guide for this product.

segment.source: Instead, you can find troubleshooting information for this product on the TechNet Wiki.
segment.target: Instead, you can find troubleshooting information for this product on the TechNet Wiki.

segment.source: Find troubleshooting information
segment.target: Find troubleshooting information

segment.source: You can use the following information to find troubleshooting content or additional technical content for this product.
segment.target: You can use the following information to find troubleshooting content or additional technical content for this product.

segment.source: Search the MDOP documentation
segment.target: Search the MDOP documentation

segment.source: The first step to find help content in the Administrator’s Guide is to search the MDOP documentation on TechNet.
segment.target: The first step to find help content in the Administrator’s Guide is to search the MDOP documentation on TechNet.

segment.source: After you search the MDOP documentation, you can search the troubleshooting information for the product in the TechNet Wiki.
segment.target: After you search the MDOP documentation, you can search the troubleshooting information for the product in the TechNet Wiki.

segment.source: These search methods are described in the following sections.
segment.target: These search methods are described in the following sections.

segment.source: To search the MDOP product documentation
segment.target: To search the MDOP product documentation

segment.source: Open a web browser and browse to the MDOP Information Experience home page on TechNet.
segment.target: Open a web browser and browse to the MDOP Information Experience home page on TechNet.

segment.source: Locate the Search TechNet with Bing search box and enter your search term.
segment.target: Locate the Search TechNet with Bing search box and enter your search term.

segment.source: Review the search results for assistance.
segment.target: Review the search results for assistance.

segment.source: To search the TechNet Wiki
segment.target: To search the TechNet Wiki

segment.source: Open a web browser and browse to the TechNet Wiki home page.
segment.target: Open a web browser and browse to the TechNet Wiki home page.

segment.source: Locate the Search TechNet Wiki search box and enter your search term.
segment.target: Locate the Search TechNet Wiki search box and enter your search term.

segment.source: Review the search results for assistance.
segment.target: Review the search results for assistance.

segment.source: Create a troubleshooting article
segment.target: Create a troubleshooting article

segment.source: If you have a troubleshooting tip or a best practice to share that is not already included in the MDOP Online Help or TechNet Wiki, you can create your own TechNet Wiki article.
segment.target: If you have a troubleshooting tip or a best practice to share that is not already included in the MDOP Online Help or TechNet Wiki, you can create your own TechNet Wiki article.

segment.source: To create a TechNet Wiki troubleshooting or best practices article
segment.target: To create a TechNet Wiki troubleshooting or best practices article

segment.source: Open a web browser and browse to the TechNet Wiki home page.
segment.target: Open a web browser and browse to the TechNet Wiki home page.

segment.source: Sign in with your Microsoft account.
segment.target: Sign in with your Microsoft account.

segment.source: Review the Getting Started section to learn the basics of the TechNet Wiki and its articles.
segment.target: Review the Getting Started section to learn the basics of the TechNet Wiki and its articles.

segment.source: Select Post an article in the Getting Started section.
segment.target: Select Post an article in the Getting Started section.

segment.source: On the Wiki article Add Page page, select Insert Template from the toolbar, select the troubleshooting article template, which is named Troubleshooting.html, and then click Insert.
segment.target: On the Wiki article Add Page page, select Insert Template from the toolbar, select the troubleshooting article template, which is named Troubleshooting.html, and then click Insert.

segment.source: Give the article a descriptive title, and then overwrite the template information as needed to create your article.
segment.target: Give the article a descriptive title, and then overwrite the template information as needed to create your article.

segment.source: After you review your article, add a tag that is named Troubleshooting and another tag for the product name.
segment.target: After you review your article, add a tag that is named Troubleshooting and another tag for the product name.

segment.source: To add tags help other users find your content.
segment.target: To add tags help other users find your content.

segment.source: Click Save to publish the article to the TechNet Wiki.
segment.target: Click Save to publish the article to the TechNet Wiki.

segment.target: Other resources for this product
